Articles.Content:
Hello to everyone, my problem is that if I launch a vessel and put it in orbit, everything is fine, but if then after a while I jump again on that vessel, whichever is the planet or the body orbited the body doesn't show, I mean, it's just a black nothing thing, in map view everything is fine, it occurs only in fly view. I tried to restart or to try another save, but the problem persists. Currently, I'm using the GEA beta, I even tried to change from Environmental visual enhancement 1.4.1 to 1.4.2 (I'm using KSP 1.4.2 with DLC). I don't have any other visual mod other than the GEA pack.

And also stars disappear, leaving only distant objects planets and a Sun that becomes similar to Gargantua of Interstellar.

 

Edited April 9, 2018 by dragonaether
